pr_title: added ability to copy comments on long press

timeline.message: added ability to copy comments on long press

timeline.body:
`itemContentView.getText()` can sometimes copy the ellipsized text. Use `commentText` instead.
```suggestion
                clipboardManager.setPrimaryClip(ClipData.newPlainText(null,commentText));
```
timeline.bodyHTML:
itemContentView.getText() can sometimes copy the ellipsized text. Use commentText instead.

Suggested change
clipboardManager.setPrimaryClip(ClipData.newPlainText(null,itemContentView.getText()));
clipboardManager.setPrimaryClip(ClipData.newPlainText(null,commentText));
